mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_no ,n.notice_title , DATE_FORMAT(n.notice_created_at, '%y-%m-%d') as notice_created_at , n.loginID , n.notice_content , f.file_no , f.file_server_path , f.file_local_path , f.file_origin , f.file_rename , f.file_extension , f.file_size FROM tb_notice as n LEFT JOIN tb_file f ON n.file_no = f.file_no WHERE n.notice_no = #{notice_no}
